channel.title: 4 simple requests, please help
channel.description:
1: i need a tut to be able to change items to admins only so that i.e. gilded if a non-admin gets it he cant wear because it deletes.
2: i need a tut which will turn the alter in varrock so you can pray at it to get prayer exp.
3: ive re-sized barrage but it dosnt hit multi targets can anyone fix it so that it does.
4: i need a tut so that i can add a portal (ive added it already) but so that it tele where i set it.
all help will be very appreciated
thanks

item.title: 4 simple requests, please help
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

all of those are pretty easy to do , look for my MSN in my profile and add me

item.title: 4 simple requests, please help
item.dc:creator: @foz foz
item.description:
@foz wrote:

i can get you

4:
i need a tut so that i can add a portal (ive added it already) but so that it tele where i set it.

in a minute, i will just have to search, i will edit my post in a min…

I THINK this is it,

open up client, search for

//QUEST_1 OBJECTS

under it, paste…

if (objectID == OBJECTID) { sendMessage("YOURMESSAGEHERE"); teleportToX = COORD; teleportToY = COORD; }

i hope it helps,

Foz

Read full topic
